metadata.title: CVE-2014-3546 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Moodle through 2.3.11, 2.4.x before 2.4.11, 2.5.x before 2.5.7, 2.6.xbefore 2.6.4, and 2.7.x before 2.7.1 does not enforce certain capabilityrequirements in (1) notes/index.php and (2) user/edit.php, which allowsremote attackers to obtain potentially sensitive username and courseinformation via a modified URL.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3546` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.7.5+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.5+dfsg-1').
